Reviews.Title: Ok wouldnt ever buy agin
Reviews.Author: Paul Gans
Reviews.Content: Camara works good mic. Not so good loud loud buzzzz even at volume 2  rip off  Dont buy.  Unless u wanted only video

ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: CCD, color DSP. Signal System: NTSC
Horizontal Resolution: 420 TVL. Lens: 3.6 mm wide angle
IR Illuminators: 24 infrared LEDs for night vision. Minimum Illumination: 0.0 Lux (IR LED on)
Cable Management: Concealed wiring inside of bracket to protect the camera from vandalism
Weatherproof metal housing for indoor and outdoor applications
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor IR Infrared Bullet Surveillance Security Camera Day Night Vision Home CCTV Color CCD Wide Angle with Pre-amp Mini Microphone, Power Supply and Extension Cable C5M
